title: Ep 144: Care Package with Ai-jen Poo
itunes:title: Ep 144: Care Package with Ai-jen Poo
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree discover they have very different tastes in candy and then welcome Ai-jen Poo (Executive Director of the National Domestic Workers Alliance, Co-Director of Caring Across Generations, Co-Founder of SuperMajority) on to the pod to talk abo...
description:
Kate and Doree discover they have very different tastes in candy and then welcome Ai-jen Poo (Executive Director of the National Domestic Workers Alliance, Co-Director of Caring Across Generations, Co-Founder of SuperMajority) on to the pod to talk about how caregiving has changed during the pandemic, what a care squad is and why it’s important, and the meaning of the pink pantsuits on Instagram.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

 

CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.

 

SIGNATURE HARDWARE - Real-life isn’t always perfect, but with Signature Hardware it is beautiful. Visit signaturehardware.com/FOREVER35 to find your style today.

 

GLOSSIER - For a limited time, new customers can get 10% off your first order at Glossier.com/podcast/FOREVER35. 

 

ROTHY’S - For free shipping and free returns/exchanges, visit rothys.com/forever35.

 

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.

 

JENNI KAYNE - Get 20% off your first order at jennikayne.com when you use code FOREVER35 at checkout.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
